alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Bardin, or near Palatka, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds around 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Hastings, East Palatka, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Picolata, Bostwick and Federal Point. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
